scripts.build: rm -Rf dist && BABEL_ENV=es5 babel -s --out-dir dist/es5 src && BABEL_ENV=es5-dev babel -s --out-dir dist/es5-dev src && BABEL_ENV=node5 babel -s --out-dir dist/node5 src && BABEL_ENV=node5-dev babel -s --out-dir dist/node5-dev src && BABEL_ENV=node6 babel -s --out-dir dist/node6 src && BABEL_ENV=node6-dev babel -s --out-dir dist/node6-dev src && BABEL_ENV=modern-browsers babel -s --out-dir dist/modern-browsers src && BABEL_ENV=modern-browsers-dev babel -s --out-dir dist/modern-browsers-dev src
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run build && pob-repository-check-clean
scripts.watch:
rm -Rf dist test/node6 && echo "BABEL_ENV=es5 babel -sw --out-dir dist/es5 src
BABEL_ENV=node5 babel -sw --out-dir dist/node5 src
BABEL_ENV=node6 babel -sw --out-dir dist/node6 src
BABEL_ENV=modern-browsers babel -sw --out-dir dist/modern-browsers src" | while read i; do printf "%q
" "$i"; done | xargs -n1 -P 4 -I cmd bash -c "cmd"
scripts.build:dev: rm -Rf dist/*-dev/ && BABEL_ENV=es5-dev babel -s --out-dir dist/es5-dev src && BABEL_ENV=node5-dev babel -s --out-dir dist/node5-dev src && BABEL_ENV=node6-dev babel -s --out-dir dist/node6-dev src && BABEL_ENV=modern-browsers-dev babel -s --out-dir dist/modern-browsers-dev src
scripts.watch:dev:
rm -Rf dist test/node6 && echo "BABEL_ENV=es5-dev babel -sw --out-dir dist/es5-dev src
BABEL_ENV=node5-dev babel -sw --out-dir dist/node5-dev src
BABEL_ENV=node6-dev babel -sw --out-dir dist/node6-dev src
BABEL_ENV=modern-browsers-dev babel -sw --out-dir dist/modern-browsers-dev src" | while read i; do printf "%q
" "$i"; done | xargs -n1 -P 4 -I cmd bash -c "cmd"
